rows.label: bf06050100_0010
rows.name:
My deepest thanks to you for agreeing to this
ceasefire, Queen Lagert, Emperor Nefer.

rows.label: bf06050100_0020
rows.name:
As I recall from the
Osirian Treaty of 350 years ago...

rows.label: bf06050100_0025
rows.name:
the Holy See was to refrain from
intervention in times of war.

rows.label: bf06050100_0030
rows.name: And yet here you are, intervening.

rows.label: bf06050100_0040
rows.name: But I trust you have a suitable justification, Your Holiness?

rows.label: bf06050100_0060
rows.name:
But first, to ensure impartiality in
these negotiations,

rows.label: bf06050100_0070
rows.name:
may I present Nilny, Acting Chairman of the
Avaritia Trade Guild.

rows.label: bf06050100_0090
rows.name:
His Highness the Crown Prince Sigurd
Brunet Luxuria will also be attending.

rows.label: bf06050100_0100
rows.name:
The Crown Prince?!
The prodigal prince of Luxuria...
